___DefaultLifeTime.description: The default lifetime assigned to a new file

___AccessMode.description: The type of access allowed for this share - AccessMode_t (undefined)

___MaximumLifeTime.description: The maximum lifetime that can be requested for a file

___ServingState.description: How the Share is currently serving jobs

___Path.description: A default namespace where files are logically placed when they are stored in this Share

___Tag.description: An identifier defined by a UserDomain

___RetentionPolicy.description: The quality of data retention - RetentionPolicy_t

___SharingID.description: A local identifier common to the set of StorageShares which use the same underling extents

___StorageShareCapacityID.description: ID of the StorageShareCapacities associated with this share

___AccessLatency.description: The maximum latency category under normal operating conditions
